item.title: By: Si & Fi
item.dc:creator: Si & Fi
item.description: <p>Well, our holiday is coming to an end - we have had a fantastic time and are planning a return trip asap!! We hope that your week is fun - I like the idea of driving round a race track!! Take care and see you, Mum & Dad and J&M soon.</p>
item.content:encoded: Well, our holiday is coming to an end – we have had a fantastic time and are planning a return trip asap!! We hope that your week is fun – I like the idea of driving round a race track!! Take care and see you, Mum & Dad and J&M soon.
